name: Docker-in-Docker (with Podman)
description: Installs Podman and RHEL-based container tools. You have to have privileged execution enabled in your devcontainer.json file for this to work.
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p /tmp/run/user/$(id -u) && chmod 0700 /tmp/run/user/$(id -u) && podman system migrate && alias docker=podman
